Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory142.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'The Industrial Carriage is right ahead of us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'This has been going unexpectedly smoothly.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "All thanks to Sophia... I'm glad you're alright.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "You might be small in stature, but you're immensely capable...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "The repair team will enter the carriage with you, then we'll split the group. The core of the manufacturing plant needs to be fixed immediately.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I'll come with you, then.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Understood.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The Industrial Carriage is filled with all kinds of machines, which means there will be quite a number of Corrupted.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'You can take them down.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "In that case, Commandant, you'll lead the team to clear the Corrupted.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'And the repair team will enter the plant to fix it up.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'The Gray Ravens will support you.', 3: '25', 4: 'You two are quite in sync...', 5: '25'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I've optimized my frame's performance.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Liv, protect Commandant. I'll be in the front, trying to provide you with the most optimal operating environment. Bianca, you've got the rear. Don't let any Corrupted go.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Understood.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: '...This feels like when I first joined the Purifying Force.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I've sent you the blueprint of the carriage. The plan can't fully represent the actual environment, so you must be careful.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'You can count on me!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Commandant, this will be a tough fight.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'll be careful.", 3: '47', 4: 'When was I ever afraid?', 5: '49'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Don't worry, I'll also do my best to protect you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I'm used to this kind of work, after all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'I believe in you.', 4: '1'}
